author: Madeline Holcombe, CNN
title: The advisory for New York, New Jersey and Connecticut comes as US coronavirus deaths surpass 2,000
description: The United States is advising residents of New York, New Jersey and Connecticut not to travel domestically after the number of reported coronavirus deaths doubled to over 2,000 nationwide within two days.
content:
(CNN)The United States is advising residents of New York, New Jersey and Connecticut not to travel domestically after the number of reported coronavirus deaths doubled to over 2,000 nationwide within two days.
